title: Omae no Koi wa Ore no Mono
description:
Captain of the Judo Club, Mochizuki, and Captain of the Karate Club, Ishio, are like cat and dog. Everyday is filled with quarrels over the small gym they share. One day, Ishio accidentally saw Mochizuki's bare skin when he was changing clothes and he became really flustered. As revenge for receiving insults from Ishio, Mochizuki created a strategy – a sex appeal strategy to ruin Ishio. Without any consideration of place or time, he would hug him, push down him, chase him anywhere, etc…

Omegaverse
